<div id="main" class="page" role="main">
  <div class="container">
    <div class="row-fluid">
      <div id="content-wrapper" class="span12 span8">
                <div id="pre-content">
          <div id="breadcrumb"><h2 class="element-invisible">You are here</h2><div class="breadcrumb"><a href="/">Home</a></div></div>                  </div>
                <div id="content">
          <div id="feature"><section id="block-block-12" class="block block-block">

    
  <div class="content">
    <p><img alt="Ralph Regula School of Computational Science Image" height="148" src="/sites/osc.edu/files/rrscs/rrscsheader1.png" width="700" /></p>
  </div>
</section></div>                                <h1 class="title" id="page-title">
              The Ralph Regula School of Computational Science              <div id="title-links"><span id="addthis"><!-- AddThis Button BEGIN -->
<div class="addthis_toolbox addthis_default_style addthis_16x16_style">
<a class="addthis_button_preferred_1"></a>
<a class="addthis_button_preferred_2"></a>
<a class="addthis_button_preferred_3"></a>
<a class="addthis_button_compact"></a>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">var addthis_config = { services_exclude:"print", ui_508_compliant:true, data_ga_property:"UA-34776817-1", data_ga_social: true };</script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="//s7.addthis.com/js/300/addthis_widget.js#pubid=51d1d1b06537f78e"></script>
<!-- AddThis Button END --></span></div>
            </h1>                                                  <section id="block-system-main" class="block block-system">

    
  <div class="content">
    <article id="node-3972" class="node node-book clearfix" about="/rrscs" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">
  <header>
                  <span property="dc:title" content="The Ralph Regula School of Computational Science" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>        </header>
  <div class="content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><figure class="caption" style="float:left"><img alt="" height="201" src="/sites/osc.edu/files/rrscs/IntCompSciGroup.jpg" width="300" /><figcaption></figcaption></figure><p>The Ralph Regula School of Computational Science at the Ohio Supercomputer Center is a statewide virtual school focused on the exciting new area of computational science -- the use of computer modeling and simulation to solve complex business, technical and academic research problems. Businesses recognize computational science as an essential tool for innovation and use it to develop new products. Researchers do the same to expand the frontiers of knowledge.</p>

<p>Students may take part in the computational science minor or associate degree program offered at 14 colleges and universities throughout the state of Ohio.  The program take an interdisciplinary approach to allow undergraduates to apply computational tools directly to their area of study.  Students use these tool to solve real-world problems in a wide range of fields.</p>

<p>In collaboration with the Ohio Board of Regents, OSC, and state colleges and universities, the Ralph Regula School ensures that Ohio students have the skillsets that companies need to support the use of this new approach to innovation.</p>
</div></div></div>  <div id="book-navigation-3972" class="book-navigation">
    <ul class="menu"><li class="first leaf"><a href="/rrscs/about">About RRSCS</a></li>
<li class="leaf"><a href="/rrscs/associate">Associate Degree Program</a></li>
<li class="leaf"><a href="/rrscs/baccalaureate">Baccalaureate Minor Program</a></li>
<li class="leaf"><a href="/rrscs/certificate">Certificate Programs</a></li>
<li class="leaf"><a href="/rrscs/contact">Contact</a></li>
<li class="leaf"><a href="/rrscs/faq">Frequently Asked Questions</a></li>
<li class="last leaf"><a href="/rrscs/links">Links</a></li>
</ul>
        <div class="page-links clearfix">
                          <a href="/rrscs/about" class="page-next" title="Go to next page">About RRSCS ›</a>
          </div>
    
  </div>
  </div>
  <footer>
    <ul class="links inline"><li class="book_printer first last"><a href="/book/export/html/3972" title="Show a printer-friendly version of this book page and its sub-pages.">Printer-friendly version</a></li>
</ul>      </footer>
</article>

  </div>
</section>                  </div>
      </div>
      <div id="sidebar-right" class="span4 pull-right">
        <div id="sidebar"><section id="block-menu-block-1" class="block block-menu-block">

    <h2>The Ralph Regula School of Computational Science</h2>
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="menu-block-wrapper menu-block-1 menu-name-book-toc-3972 parent-mlid-0 menu-level-2">

</section><section id="block-views-calendar-items-block" class="block block-views">

    <h2>Translate</h2>
  
  <div class="content">
    <div id="google_translate_element"></div>
          <script>
            function googleTranslateElementInit() {
              new google.translate.TranslateElement({
                pageLanguage: 'en'
              }, 'google_translate_element');
            }
          </script>
          <script src="//translate.google.com/translate_a/element.js?cb=googleTranslateElementInit"></script>  </div>
